what: R functions to retrieve and process raw data from package `gulf`
title: R functions to retrieve and process raw data from package `gulf`
text: R functions retrieve DFO data housed internally often associated package gulf (e.g., , , ), perform downstream processing quality control prior analysis.

title: R functions to retrieve and process raw data from package `gulf`
text: fully functional get.gulf available DFO Gulf Fisheries staff -house gulf package well access \\ENT.dfo-mpo.ca\dfo-mpo\GROUP\GLF\Regional_Shares\AquaRes_Common\FishFramSci.

title: R functions to retrieve and process raw data from package `gulf`
R functions to retrieve and process raw data from package `gulf`
text: Years: 1971 - 2024 Vessels: E.E. Prince (1971 - 1985) fishing Yankee-36 trawl Lady Hammond (1985 - 1991) fishing Western IIA bottom-trawl CCGS Alfred Needler (1992 - 2002, 2004 - 2005) fishing Western IIA bottom-trawl CCGS Wilfred Templeman (2003) fishing Western IIA bottom-trawl CCGS Teleost (2004 - 2022) fishing Western IIA bottom-trawl CCGS Capt. Jacques Cartier (2021 - 2024), fishing modified version Northeast Fisheries Science Center Ecosystem Survey Trawl, NEST (trawl details Denton 2020; modifications outlined Ricard et al. 2023).

title: R functions to retrieve and process raw data from package `gulf`
text: get.gulf currently applies vessel correction factors years 1993 onward catches adjusted vessel effects, non-Teleost catches adjusted Teleost equivalents adjust catches CCGS Alfred Needler CCGS Wilfred Templeman, get.gulf applies vessel correction factors described Benoît 2006. adjust catches CCGS Capt. Jacques Cartier, get.gulf applies vessel correction factors described Benoît Yin, 2023. See ?get_catch

title: R functions to retrieve and process raw data from package `gulf`
text: get.gulf applies diel correction factors night catches made CCGS Teleost, night catches adjusted equivalent CCGS Teleost. Correction factors used get.gulf described Benoît Swain, 2003a, Benoît Swain, 2003b, Benoît 2006. Diel correction factors implemented specific species, years 1993 onward. See ?get_catch.

title: R functions to retrieve and process raw data from package `gulf`
text: Commercial landings data go back 1985. get.gulf retrieves data housed DFO Quebec Region. See ?get_ziff.

what: Get species catch number and catch weight per tow from sGSL September surveys — get_catch
title: Get species catch number and catch weight per tow from sGSL September surveys — get_catch
Get species catch number and catch weight per tow from sGSL September surveys — get_catch
code: get_catch(   species,   years,   adj.ratio = TRUE,   adj.distance = TRUE,   adj.vessel = TRUE,   adj.diel = TRUE,   experiment.code = c(1, 5),   cutoff.length = NULL,   adj.repeat.sets = TRUE,   pool.sexes = TRUE,   return.lengths = FALSE )

title: Get species catch number and catch weight per tow from sGSL September surveys — get_catch
text: species RV species code? Currently limited certain species applying diel vessel conversions (10,12,23,40,41,42,43,60,70). years year(s) return? Current minimum apply conversions 1993. adj.ratio Adjust sampling ratio? Default TRUE. adj.distance Adjust target tow distance? Default TRUE. adj.vessel Adjust vessel effects? Default TRUE. adj.diel Adjust diel effects? Default TRUE. Note diel adjustments made vessel adjustments Teleost. experiment.code Restrict tow experiment type? See gulf::experiment.str(). Default c(1,5) ("stratified random survey set", "comparative fishing experiment"). cutoff.length Include estimates cutoff length? Output columns labeled "small" estimates cutoff length. Output columns labeled "big" estimates cutoff length. Default NULL adj.repeat.sets Adjust repeat sets? Identifies repeat sets (e.g., comparative tows), retains first set. First sets retained order preserve tow information (e.g., spatial coordinates, depth), different gulf package's 'collapse.repeats' function. Experiment codes "1" "5" removed adjusting paired sets. See ?gulf::experiment.str() details. Default TRUE pool.sexes Pool (combine) sexes final output? Default TRUE. return.lengths Return counts length? TRUE, list 3 data frames returned. Default FALSE.

title: Get species catch number and catch weight per tow from sGSL September surveys — get_catch
text: data frame unless return.lengths = TRUE, case list 3 data frames returned.

title: Get species catch number and catch weight per tow from sGSL September surveys — get_catch

Easily query the gulf::species.names for matches to a pattern — get_species_codes
text: pattern pattern search . Case insensitive. Use "^" "begins ", "$" "ends ". See examples. field field (column), search pattern

title: Easily query the gulf::species.names for matches to a pattern — get_species_codes

what: Get raw commercial landings data from a ZIFF (Zonal Interchange Format File) — get_ziff
title: Get raw commercial landings data from a ZIFF (Zonal Interchange Format File) — get_ziff
text: Retrieves data housed DFO Quebec Region

title: Get raw commercial landings data from a ZIFF (Zonal Interchange Format File) — get_ziff
code: get_ziff(   years,   nafo = NULL,   species.caught = NULL,   species.sought = NULL,   headers = "english" )

title: Get raw commercial landings data from a ZIFF (Zonal Interchange Format File) — get_ziff
text: years year(s) return. nafo NAFO division(s). Case insensitive. species.caught STATAC species code. species.sought STATAC species code. headers returned data frame column names (headers) English French. Default English.

title: Get raw commercial landings data from a ZIFF (Zonal Interchange Format File) — get_ziff
